snippet: The shareholders’ vote tallies will not force any change at Wal-Mart, but they highlight support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.
abstract: Breakdown of Wal-Mart shareholders’ vote tallies show sustained opposition among some outside shareholders to company’s chief executive Michael T Duke, and highlight support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.
lead_paragraph: The shareholders’ vote tallies will not force any change at Wal-Mart, but they highlight support for several proposals regarding broader disclosure and changes to the board.

headline.seo: Wal-Mart Vote Tallies Show Continued Opposition to Michael Duke, the Company Chief
headline.main: Discontent With Chief Is Seen in Votes by Wal-Mart Shareholders
headline.print_headline: Discontent With Chief Is Seen in Votes by Wal-Mart Shareholders
